title: WhatsApp beta improves account security by letting users hide their phone number
description: WhatsApp seeks to help your maintain your anonymity in Communities from everyone except those who know you.

title: Samsung's S90C OLED Smart TV series gets its biggest upgrade yet
description: Samsung is introducing a new 83-inch option to its S90C TVs sporting immersive 3D audio and the company's Gaming Hub.

title: Take your webcam capture up a notch with the OBSBOT Tiny 2
description: OBSBOT is leading the pack in the smart webcam market with their latest release, the Tiny 2. Capture crystal clear 4K video with the power of AI tech improving your shots, perfect for live streaming or virtual meetings.

title: Sega becomes first major business to realize blockchain isn't all it's cracked up to be
description: Sonic the Hedgehog developer and former hardware manufacturer’s latest mastercrash in predicting industry trends is starting to worry the top brass.

title: Social media shutdowns might be happening in the EU with new law
description: EU Commissioner Thierry Breton backed French President Macron's call for debate on social media with new Digital Service Act. Here, what's at stake.

title: Microsoft has won its Activision Blizzard acquisiton case with the FTC
description: With the acquisition now free to proceed in the US, the UK is the last holdout

title: Intel says it has now patched all its buggy Sapphire Rapids chips
description: Intel took some Sapphire Rapids chips off the shelves while it worked on a bug fix affecting non-commercially available software.

title: Microsoft Surface Book could get one over on the MacBook with some neat stylus tricks
description: New patent suggests Microsoft could be preparing to supercharge the Surface Pen.

title: Razer might have suffered another major data breach
description: Razer investigating the apparent sale of sensitive corporate and customer sensitive data on hacking forum.

title: Millions of HCA Healthcare customers have data stolen - here's what you need to know
description: It's unclear what type of data was stolen in the attack, but the company claims no clinical information was taken.

title: Mozilla says it will start blocking a whole host of browser add-ons
description: New Quarantined Domains feature in Firefox 115 will block certain add-ons on certain sites.

title: You can finally buy Samsung’s long-awaited 83-inch OLED TV
description: Samsung's biggest ever OLED TV is officially here and you can order yours today.

title: New Kyoto-based indie studio has begun work on a title codenamed Project Tanuki
description: Former Q-Games and Chuhai Labs developers are joining forces to form a new indie games studio and develop a debut title.

title: The Witcher may be Netflix’s #1 most-watched show, but #4 on the list has 100% on Rotten Tomatoes
description: The Witcher may be the most-watched Netflix TV show this week, but it's Our Planet II that the critics say is a must see.

title: Apple is fixing a critical security bug that affects iOS, macOS and Safari, so patch now
description: Flaw allowed threat actors to run arbitrary code on affected Apple devices, possibly granting access to data, apps, and more.

title: Microsoft announces hundreds more corporate job cuts
description: Office-based and remote workers are being laid off in and around Microsoft’s headquarters as it enters a new fiscal year.

title: New Black Panther game: everything we know so far
description: Black Panther is currently in the works over at Cliffhanger Games. Here's what we know so far.

title: Still on Windows 11 21H2? Forced upgrades are coming as Microsoft reminds us it’s on life support
description: Microsoft will soon no longer support Windows 11 21H2, so users need to upgrade to continue to get security fixes.

title: Windows 11 gets a fix for one of Microsoft’s most embarrassing bugs ever
description: A security-related bug that has been producing worrying error messages has been resolved.

title: PC sales keep falling around the globe, so this could be a great time to upgrade
description: Stock overloads following a period of poor supplies are giving manufacturers real headaches - get your new PC deal now.

title: Leaked Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 photos give us our best look yet at the phone
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 folds flat but has a visible crease in leaked photos.

title: Beware - these Amazon Prime Day scams could leave you seriously out of pocket
description: Phishing attacks are as popular as Amazon Prime Day itself - there are a few things you need to look out for.

title: My job is testing audio and this is the Amazon Prime Day headphones deal I'm buying
description: Edifier Stax Spirit S3 are unbeatable for clarity, nuance and sonic panache in their price range – and now they're 20% off.

title: Foundation TV show creator isn't interested in your wild Star Wars comparisons
description: Foundation showrunner David S. Goyer wants to end comparisons between the Apple TV Plus show and other iconic sci-fi franchises.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Tuesday, July 11 (game #533)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Fitbit Charge 5 users experiencing sudden battery drain after a recent update
description: The patch has also been blamed for Charge 5 trackers suddenly bricking with many frustrated at the lack of help.
